question: A lends Rs. 2500 to B and certain sum to C at the same time at 7% annual simple interest. If after 4 years, A altogether receives Rs. 1120 as interest from B and C, the sum lent to C is :
explanation:
Let the sum lent to C be x
According to the question,
$latex => \\frac{2500\\times 7\\times 4}{100}+\\frac{x\\times 7\\times 4}{100}=1120&s=1$
$latex =>2500\\times 28 + 28x = 112000$
$latex => 2500 + x = 4000$
$latex => x = 4000-2500 = 1500$
Hence option [B] is the right answer.
